T02D1481:125a-0: @125a * // he ru ka'i rnam par dag pa bzhugs /
T02D1481:125a-2: # // bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1481:125a-3: bcom ldan rje btsun dpal he ru ka'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa ni /
T02D1481:125a-4: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02D1481:125a-5: yang dag pa ni phyin ci ma log pa ste /
T02D1481:125a-6: nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1481:125a-7: sems so sor rig pa la sogs pa zla ba dang /
T02D1481:125a-10: phung po gcig gis rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1481:125a-11: de nyid ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa yin la /
T02D1481:125a-12: mos pa ni lhag par mos pas te /
T02D1481:125a-13: khyad par can gyis lha'i rnam par bsgom pa'i byang
T02D1481:125a-14: chub kyi phyogs kyi chos ma lus pa ro gcig
T02D1481:125a-15: pa'i bdag nyid can gyi spyod pa ni /
T02D1481:125a-16: ma rig pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1481:125a-17: yang na dngos po so so'i rnam par dag pa gzhan dang gzhan ma yin te /
T02D1481:125a-18: zhal bzhi ni dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin can te /
T02D1481:125a-19: 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1481:125a-20: stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i
T02D1481:125a-21: sgo'i khyad par can gyi 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yin
T02D1481:125a-22: pa'i phyir ro // de la phyag bcu gnyis kyi
T02D1481:125a-23: dang pos da ma ru ni sbyin pa'i pha rol
T02D1481:125a-24: tu phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa yin te /
T02D1481:125a-25: 'di ltar rang dang gzhan dbyer med pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1481:125a-26: gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa rtag tu chos kyi sgra
T02D1481:125b-0: ser sna dang gzhan gyi bde ba 'phrog pa'i gnyen po @125b yin no //
T02D1481:125b-1: de nyid ni sa rab tu dga' ba ste /
T02D1481:125b-2: bdag dang gzhan dbyer med pa'i bde ba chen po'i
T02D1481:125b-3: dga' ba de skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i
T02D1481:125b-4: phyir ro // dgra sta ni tshul khrims kyi shel dag pa dang 'dra bar dag pa yin te /
T02D1481:125b-5: 'di ltar srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi dge ba dang /
T02D1481:125b-6: bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig las 'das pa la
T02D1481:125b-7: sogs pa 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis 'dus byas gcod
T02D1481:125b-9: de nyid ni sa dri ma med pa ste /
T02D1481:125b-10: sdig pa thams cad las ldog par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1481:125b-11: gri gug ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1481:125b-12: pha rol kun nas 'khrug pas mtshon dang dbyig pa dang /
T02D1481:125b-13: phag dum la sogs pas bsnun pas rnam par shes
T02D1481:125b-14: pa 'khrug cing mi bzod pa kun nas gcod par
T02D1481:125b-15: byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1481:125b-16: de nyid ni sa 'od byed pa yin te /
T02D1481:125b-17: mi 'khrugs pas sems la gnas shing /
T02D1481:125b-18: gnas pas mi shes pa rnam par 'jig la /
T02D1481:125b-19: de med pas ye shes rnyogs pa med pa rab
T02D1481:125b-20: tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1481:125b-21: // rtse gsum pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa yin te /
T02D1481:125b-22: snyom las dang le lo dang brtson 'grus med pa dang /
T02D1481:125b-23: spro ba med pas lam ma yin pa la rjes
T02D1481:125b-24: su spyod pa'i phyir ngan 'gro ngan song dmyal ba
T02D1481:125b-25: la sogs pa'i ming dang gzugs 'byung ba de'i gnyen
T02D1481:125b-26: po lus dang ngag dang yid mkhyen pa'i rtse gsum
T02D1481:125b-28: bde bar gshegs pa skul bar byed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1481:125b-29: de nyid ni sa 'od 'phro ba yin te /
T02D1481:125b-31: ye shes rnam par 'phro ba'i blo'i khyad par shes
T02D1481:125b-32: rab kyi mthu gang gis bde bar gshegs pa nyid
T02D1481:125b-33: du 'gyur ba zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02D1481:125b-34: kha tv'am ga ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1481:125b-35: 'di ltar bsam gtan rtse gcig pas skye mched drug gis rnam bar g-yeng ba spangs pas /
T02D1481:125b-36: phung po la sogs pa ma lus pa'i mgo bo nas brtsams te /
T02D1481:125b-37: rkang pa'i mthar thug rnam par bcad na /
T02D1481:125b-38: nang stong pa nyid du ro gcig cing g-yo ba med pa nyid ni dung dang /
T02D1481:125b-41: shel dag pa dang 'dra ba yin te /
T02D1481:126a-0: sems kyi rang bzhin du gyur @126a * //
T02D1481:126a-2: de nyid ni sa rab tu sbyang dka' ba yin te /
T02D1481:126a-3: rab tu ste nges par mi mthun pa'i phyogs bdud kyis thub par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1481:126a-4: dril bu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1481:126a-5: 'di ltar shes rab ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang
T02D1481:126a-6: ngag gi tha snyad la sogs pa'i gnyen po yin
T02D1481:126a-7: te / chos kyi gsung rin po che'i sgra snyan pa skye ba med pa'i sgyor bas /
T02D1481:126a-8: 'gro ba yang dag par ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1481:126a-9: de ni sa mngon du gyur pa yin te /
T02D1481:126a-10: chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D1481:126a-11: sgra mngon du gyur pas brjod pa ni ldog pa
T02D1481:126a-13: chos nyid des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T02D1481:126a-14: kyi 'bras bur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1481:126a-15: // rdo rje ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa yin te //
T02D1481:126a-16: gang gis sbyin pa la sogs pa la nye bar
T02D1481:126a-17: spyod cing nan tan du byed pa de ni thabs
T02D1481:126a-18: yin te / ser sna la sogs pa thabs ma yin pa'i gnyen po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1481:126a-19: de'i 'bras bur gyur pa ni grangs ji lta ba
T02D1481:126a-20: bzhin du me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs
T02D1481:126a-21: pa lnga rang bzhin gcig zab pa dang rgya che
T02D1481:126a-22: ba'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1481:126a-23: de nyid ni sa ring du song ba yin te //
T02D1481:126a-24: gang gi phyir 'di ltar stong pa nyid dang snying
T02D1481:126a-25: rje chen po dbyer med pa'i lam gyi sgo nas
T02D1481:126a-26: shin tu bde ba la sogs pa myong ba las
T02D1481:126a-27: des sems can thams cad skad cig ma gcig gis
T02D1481:126a-28: ring du song bar byed pa ste /
T02D1481:126a-29: thob par byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1481:126a-30: padma'i snod ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa yin te /
T02D1481:126a-31: 'di ltar dang po sems bskyed pa'i dus su /
T02D1481:126a-32: bdag dpal he ru kar gyur cig ces bya ba
T02D1481:126a-33: la sogs pa'i sgo nas dam bcas pa'i smon lam
T02D1481:126a-34: yin te / sems can gyi don la bab pa
T02D1481:126a-35: smon lam gyi rgyan gyis nye bar brgyan pa ni
T02D1481:126a-36: yin te / / smon lam ma yin pa'i shes
T02D1481:126a-37: pa'i rtsa ba can 'khor bar 'byin par byed pa'i
T02D1481:126a-38: sred ba de'i gnyen por gyur pas /
T02D1481:126a-39: ye shes kyi bdud rtsis nang kun nas bkang ba can mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1481:126a-40: rang dang gzhan gyi don la dbye ba med pa
T02D1481:126a-41: rgyun mi 'chad pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D1481:126a-42: // de nyid ni sa mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1481:126b-0: zhags pa @126b ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa yin te /
T02D1481:126b-1: 'di ltar stobs dang mthu dang nus pa ma tshang
T02D1481:126b-2: ba med pas kun du rtog pa'i nye bar len
T02D1481:126b-3: pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1481:126b-4: tshul bzhin g-yo ba med pa'i chos la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
T02D1481:126b-5: kun nas dbang du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1481:126b-6: de nyid ni sa legs pa'i blo gros yin te /
T02D1481:126b-7: legs pa'i blo gros ni dge ba'i blo ste /
T02D1481:126b-8: rnam par rtog pa 'dzin pa gcod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1481:126b-9: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phag mo ni ye shes
T02D1481:126b-10: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa
T02D1481:126b-11: ste / 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa mtshon bya dang /
T02D1481:126b-13: brjod pa med par ro gcig pa'i dga' ba bde
T02D1481:126b-14: ba chen po'i rang bzhin can bdag dang bdag gir
T02D1481:126b-16: dngos por 'dzin pa'i gnyen pos snang ba med par byed par bzod pa /
T02D1481:126b-18: rgod pa'i phyogs gnyis ka yongs su gcod pa'o //
T02D1481:126b-19: de nyid kyi phyir de dag gcod par byed pas te /
T02D1481:126b-21: de gnyis ka mnyam pa nyid kyi ro myang ba'i phyir //
T02D1481:126b-22: khrag gis yongs su bkang ba'i snod yin no //
T02D1481:126b-23: de nyid ni sa chos kyi sprin yin te /
T02D1481:126b-24: 'di ltar spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin can gyi chos nyid ni sprin yin te /
T02D1481:126b-25: sprin dang 'dra bar rang bzhin gyi chu'i rgyun gyis rlan par byed pa'i phyir /
T02D1481:126b-26: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa tshim par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1481:126b-27: tshangs pa'i mgo bo ni phung po'i bdud kyi rang bzhin yin te /
T02D1481:126b-28: 'di ltar khams gsum pa phung po lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1481:126b-29: can gyi lus de skyed par byed pa tshangs pa'i
T02D1481:126b-30: ngar 'dzin pa can log par smra ba de nyid
T02D1481:126b-31: ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po'i bdud las skyes
T02D1481:126b-33: rnam par shes pa ngar 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal gcod par byed pa'i phyir /
T02D1481:126b-34: tshangs pa'i mgo gdong bzhi pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1481:126b-35: 'jigs byed ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi rang bzhin yin te /
T02D1481:126b-36: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags kyi rtsa ba can yin la /
T02D1481:126b-37: 'dod chags ni dbang phyug chen po yin te /
T02D1481:126b-38: 'dod pas zhen pa'i 'dod pas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i nga rgyal can /
T02D1481:127a-0: @127a * // bdag 'ching bar byed pa de nyid 'khor ba yin no //
T02D1481:127a-1: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la sogs pas lus rgas pa /
T02D1481:127a-3: smin ma dang sma ra la sogs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i bdag nyid /
T02D1481:127a-4: ngag gi rang bzhin 'brug sgra la sogs pa sgrogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1481:127a-5: de'i nga rgyal bzlog pa'i don du rol pas nges
T02D1481:127a-6: par ma bzung zhing 'bad rtsol med par g-yon pa'i
T02D1481:127a-7: zhabs kyis gan rkyal du mnan pa yin no zhes
T02D1481:127a-9: dus mtshan ni 'chi bdag gi bdud kyi rang bzhin yin te /
T02D1481:127a-10: phung po rnam par 'jig cing stong pa nyid do //
T02D1481:127a-13: da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum na yod pa'i phyi
T02D1481:127a-14: dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi 'khor ba'i chos
T02D1481:127a-15: zab par byed pa'i bdag nyid can gcig tu mya
T02D1481:127a-16: ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can khong khro ba'i
T02D1481:127a-17: sems kyi rgyun thams cad med pa /
T02D1481:127a-18: 'dod chags dang bral ba mtshan mo mi shes pa
T02D1481:127a-19: mun pa de la zhabs g-yas pa reg pas bskyed
T02D1481:127a-20: pa'i bde ba chen po'i rnam pa'i ye shes nges
T02D1481:127a-22: 'dod chags chen po yang dag pa'i thabs yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1481:127a-23: glang po che'i pags pa ni lha'i bu'i bdud yin te /
T02D1481:127a-25: de'i bu ni de las skyes pa'o //
T02D1481:127a-26: glang po chen po bgegs kyi dbang phyug ste /
T02D1481:127a-27: log 'dren nyon mongs pa sgrib pa mun pa mun nag rmongs pa /
T02D1481:127a-28: thab pa dang rgya che ba'i ye shes thob par
T02D1481:127a-29: byed pa'i rgyu dang 'gal bar byed pa de'i nyon
T02D1481:127a-30: mongs pa'i pags pa bshus te /
T02D1481:127a-31: phyag g-yas pa dang g-yon pa gnyis kyis gos bzhin
T02D1481:127a-32: du rgyal mtshan gyi bla mar phub pa dang 'dra
T02D1481:127a-33: bar kun nas bgegs med par bya ba dang /
T02D1481:127a-34: srid pa dang zhi ba gnyis kyis gdung ba gnyis
T02D1481:127a-35: su med pa'i ro gcig pa chen po'i grib ma
T02D1481:127a-36: bsil ba dang 'dra bar tshim par byed pa nyid
T02D1481:127a-37: kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1481:127a-38: de dag nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gnyis pa yin te /
T02D1481:127a-39: 'di ltar bdud bzhi'i stobs dang ngar 'dzin bcom nas /
T02D1481:127a-40: shin tu rmongs pa chen po la sogs pa'i gnyen
T02D1481:127a-41: po sgom pa'i stobs rtogs pa las skyes pa phyag
T02D1481:127b-0: rgya chen po'i @127b 'dus te reg pa'i kun du
T02D1481:127b-1: bzang po ro gcig pa dang mtha' gnyis ka ma
T02D1481:127b-2: lus pa'i rnam pa'i ye shes dri ma med pa'i
T02D1481:127b-4: gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1481:127b-5: stag gi pags pa ni zhi khro ba yin te /
T02D1481:127b-6: yul drug la dgod pa dang /
T02D1481:127b-8: lus dang ngag dang sems cher 'khrugs pa las khro ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1481:127b-9: de nyid ni shin tu khro ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D1481:127b-10: sna tshogs pa la mngon par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D1481:127b-11: stag ni sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa yin no //
T02D1481:127b-12: de las bshus nas mnabs pa ni tshangs par spyod
T02D1481:127b-13: pa la rjes su spyod pa'i ngang tshul can nyid
T02D1481:127b-15: dbang po'i mdud pa'i kun nas dregs pa zhi bas
T02D1481:127b-16: khro ba med pa'i skad cig ma'i bdag nyid can
T02D1481:127b-17: no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1481:127b-18: de nyid ni rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02D1481:127b-19: 'di ltar rdo rje 'dra bar dbyer med cing mi
T02D1481:127b-20: 'khrugs pa dbang po'i sgo nas bde ba chen po
T02D1481:127b-21: yid la byed pa'i las la mkhas pa /
T02D1481:127b-22: las ma yin pa'i gnyen po ye shes kyi spyod pa'i ngang tshul can zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1481:127b-23: chags pa ni mi mgo'i phreng ba yin te /
T02D1481:127b-24: 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad longs spyod pa'i don du phung po la sogs pa la chags shing /
T02D1481:127b-26: de bzlog pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis phung
T02D1481:127b-27: po de nyid kyi mgo la sogs pa'i yan lag
T02D1481:127b-28: so so tha dad par bkod pa tsam re re
T02D1481:127b-29: zhing phye na mi brtan pa nyid du de dag
T02D1481:127b-30: khong du chud pa'i phyir mgrin pa nas brtsams te
T02D1481:127b-31: / bus mo'i bar du me tog gi chun 'phyang
T02D1481:127b-32: dang 'dra ba'i thod pa'i phreng ba shin tu rlon
T02D1481:127b-33: pa brgyus pa ni phung po lnga /
T02D1481:127b-34: lnga lnga'i bdag nyid can dang /
T02D1481:127b-35: 'byung ba bzhi re re zhing lnga lnga'i bdag nyid can dang /
T02D1481:127b-36: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa lnga /
T02D1481:127b-37: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1481:127b-38: de nyid ni rin chen padma'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02D1481:127b-39: rin po che ni rdo rje yin la /
T02D1481:127b-40: padma ni chos 'byung ba yin te /
T02D1481:127b-41: de gnyis rnam par sad pa las /
T02D1481:127b-43: 'od dpag med pa ro gcig tu skyes pa'i bde
T02D1481:127b-44: ba chen po'i bdag nyid can gyi lus phung po
T02D1481:128a-0: @128a * // lnga la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de'i pha rol te ngogs /
T02D1481:128a-1: phyag rgya chen po der phyin cing thob pa'i phyir /
T02D1481:128a-2: pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02D1481:128a-3: de'i rang bzhin ni mi mgo'i phreng ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1481:128a-4: de kho na nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam par dag pa ni ral pa /
T02D1481:128a-6: de kho na nyid ma lus pa gcig tu byas pa 'jig pa med par ston par byed la /
T02D1481:128a-7: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i skra lan bu gnyis
T02D1481:128a-8: gcus pa'i nyis sgril dang spyi bor sna tshogs rdo
T02D1481:128a-9: rje rigs lnga can gyis brgyan pa dang /
T02D1481:128a-10: ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid thod pa lnga'i tshad sor lnga pas sbras pa dang /
T02D1481:128a-11: g-yon gyi char ye shes 'od gsal ba zla bas mtshan pa /
T02D1481:128a-12: khams gsum pa ro gcig pa'i bdag nyid mi bskyod
T02D1481:128a-13: pa'i dbang phyug dang mtshungs par chags pa'i 'khor los
T02D1481:128a-14: rgyas btab ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1481:128a-15: sgra'i phyogs gcig mi shigs pa'i rnam par bskyod mi nus pa la brten nas /
T02D1481:128a-16: rnam par g-yeng ba'i tshul du 'byung ba'i sgra mi
T02D1481:128a-17: snyan pa'i don yin na yang de'i bdag nyid ma
T02D1481:128a-18: lus pa'i byang chub kyi ngo bo skye ba'i rgyu'i
T02D1481:128a-19: mtshan nyid ni rna ba'i phyag rgya yin no //
T02D1481:128a-20: mgul rgyan ni skal ba ngan pa'i ngag gi brjod pa yongs su spang ba dang /
T02D1481:128a-21: nyin mtshan du rgyun mi 'chad par sngags zlo ba'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D1481:128a-22: sems can gdon pa'i rgyus grags pa phun sum tshogs
T02D1481:128a-23: pa'i rin po che'i bdud rtsi myong ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1481:128a-24: can yin no // gdu bu ni srog gcod pa
T02D1481:128a-25: la sogs brjes su spyod pa las ldog pa'i don
T02D1481:128a-26: can yin no // dang / bsod nams dang ye
T02D1481:128a-27: shes kyi tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
T02D1481:128a-28: kyi dpal phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin can rnam
T02D1481:128a-29: par snang mdzad 'od 'phro ba'i mtshan nyid can yin
T02D1481:128a-30: can yin no // dang / no // sku regs
T02D1481:128a-31: ni phyag rgya chen po don yod pa mo gsham
T02D1481:128a-32: can yin no // dang / no // ma yin
T02D1481:128a-33: pa / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i dngos grub kyi
T02D1481:128a-34: snod ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ro gcig pa
T02D1481:128a-35: can yin no // dang / no // ma yin
T02D1481:128a-36: pa / can yin no // thal ba ni ye
T02D1481:128a-37: shes kyi me 'bar bas phung po dang 'byung ba
T02D1481:128a-38: bsregs pas snang ba med pas /
T02D1481:128b-0: byang chub kyi sems @128b dkar pos yongs su byugs pa dang /
T02D1481:128b-3: ye shes kyi snal mas se ral khar byas pa yin te /
T02D1481:128b-4: rab kyi mthar phyin pa thob pa dang po'i rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin can ni /
T02D1481:128b-5: thal ba dang tshangs pa'i skud pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1481:128b-6: de ltar skad cig ma bcu drug dang /
T02D1481:128b-7: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
T02D1481:128b-8: pa rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /
T02D1481:128b-9: sa bcu dang dbang phyug la sogs pa drug gi
T02D1481:128b-10: chos kyi rang bzhin can bcom ldan 'das dpal he
T02D1481:128b-11: ru ka rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag
T02D1481:128b-12: bcu gnyis bdud bzhi 'dul bar mdzad pa /
T02D1481:128b-13: bde ba chen po'i ye shes ro gcig pa 'grib
T02D1481:128b-14: pa med pa nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid can
T02D1481:128b-16: bcu gsum pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1481:128b-17: slob dpon shraddh'a ka ra warmmas mdzad pa /
T02D1481:128b-18: he ru ka'i rnam par dag pa rdzogs so /
